member.name: T:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TreeGridViewColumn
member.summary: Represents a column that displays hierarchical data.

member.name: T:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TreeListViewItem
member.summary: Represents an item in the TreeListView control aware of its indentation and expansion state (can be expanded or collapsed). It is recommended to set at least these data properties: Indentation. These data properties can also be set: IsExpanded.

member.name: F:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TreeListViewItem.IndentationProperty
member.summary: Identifies the Indentation dependency property.

member.name: F:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TreeListViewItem.IsExpandedProperty
member.summary: Identifies the IsExpanded dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TreeListViewItem.Indentation
member.summary: Gets or sets the indentation level of this TreeListViewItem. The hierarchy is based on the indentation level values of the nodes, so that a node with a lower index in the collection and having a specific indentation level will become the parent node for the nodes with a higher index in the collection and having an increased indentation level. It is recommended to set this property. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TreeListViewItem.IsExpanded
member.summary: Gets or sets the expansion indicator of this TreeListViewItem. If a parent node is expanded its child nodes become visible. If a parent node is collapsed its child nodes become invisible. This is a dependency property.

member.summary: Predefines the license content to be considered for TreeListView component instances, at initialization time.
member.param: The XML content string of the license to be defined for this component type.

member.name: T:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TreeListView
member.summary: Represents a control that displays a tree-list of node data items. Use Items property to add node data items to an ItemCollection managed by the control, or set ItemsSource to your own node data item collection. It is recommended to set at least these data member properties: IndentationMemberPath. These data member properties can also be set: IsExpandedMemberPath. Alternatively you can set the NodeManagerSource to a customized node manager to use and to ignore the items collection and any associated data member properties. It is recommended to use a single NodeManager instance for each set of distinct node data items and data member properties at any specific time, and to use the Dispose method to release the resources used by an instance that is no longer needed.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TreeListView.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the TreeListView class. The initial values of the data member properties are set to appropriate property paths for using NodeItem objects.

member.summary: Gets the item template to be used within the ListView host.

member.summary: Updates the internal selected item collection to reflect the selection changes in the ListView host.
member.param: Gets a list that contains the entities that were selected.
Gets a list that contains the entities that were unselected.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TreeListView.InitializeGridViewColumns(System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection,System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection)
member.summary: Initializes the GridViewColumnCollection to be used based on a specified source GridViewColumnCollection.
member.param: The source GridViewColumnCollection to be considered.

member.summary: Gets the column cell template of a specified GridViewColumn.
member.param: The column to get the cell template for.
The content template to be used.
member.returns: The column cell template of the specified GridViewColumn.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TreeListView.GetNode(System.Object)
member.summary: Gets the node in the TreeListView that wraps the specified item.
member.param: The item to get the node for.
member.returns: The node in the hierarchy that wraps the specified item.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TreeListView.GetNodeAt(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the node in the TreeListView at the specified index.
member.param: The zero-based index of the node to be get.
member.returns: The node in the hierarchy at the specified index.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TreeListView.IndentationMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to an Int32 value on the source node item to serve as the indentation level in the hierarchical collection, or null to indicate that the indentation level is not provided by the source node item. The hierarchy is based on the indentation level values of the nodes, so that a node with a lower index in the collection and having a specific indentation level will become the parent node for the nodes with a higher index in the collection and having an increased indentation level. It is recommended to set this property. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TreeListView.IsExpandedMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a Boolean value on the source node item to serve as the expansion indicator in the hierarchical collection, or null to indicate that the expansion indicator is not provided by the source node item. If a parent node is expanded its child nodes become visible. If a parent node is collapsed its child nodes become invisible. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TreeListView.NodeManagerSource
member.summary: Gets or sets a custom NodeManager object to use internally within this TreeListView. When this property is set to a node manager instance the control items collection and the associated data member properties are ignored. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TreeListView.NodeManager
member.summary: Gets the NodeManager object that is used internally for managing nodes displayed by this TreeListView. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TreeListView.ManagedNodes
member.summary: Gets the node collection managed by this TreeListView. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TreeListView.IsNodeIndentationReadOnly
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the node indentation is read-only in the TreeListView control so that the user cannot update it using the keyboard or by executing specific commands. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TreeListView.IsNodeExpansionReadOnly
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the node expansion state is read-only in the TreeListView control so that the user cannot update it using the keyboard or mouse or by executing specific commands. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TreeListView.SelectedNode
member.summary: Gets or sets the first node in the current selection or returns null if the selection is empty. This is a dependency property.
member.exception: The SelectionMode property is set to Single.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TreeListView.SelectedNodes
member.summary: Gets the currently selected nodes. This is a dependency property.
member.exception: The SelectionMode property is set to Single.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TreeListView.CanIncreaseIndentation
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the indentation for any of the selected nodes in this TreeListView can be increased.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TreeListView.CanDecreaseIndentation
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the indentation for any of the selected nodes in this TreeListView can be decreased.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TreeListView.CanExpand
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether any of the selected nodes in this TreeListView can be expanded.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TreeListView.CanExpandBranch
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the branch can be expanded for any of the selected nodes in this TreeListView.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TreeListView.CanExpandAll
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether any node in this TreeListView can be expanded.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TreeListView.CanCollapse
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether any of the selected nodes in this TreeListView can be collapsed.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TreeListView.CanCollapseBranch
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the branch can be collapsed for any of the selected nodes in this TreeListView.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TreeListView.CanCollapseAll
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether any node in this TreeListView can be collapsed.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TreeListView.RootNodes
member.summary: Gets the root nodes managed by this TreeListView. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TreeListView.RootCount
member.summary: Gets the count of root nodes managed by this TreeListView. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TreeListView.LeafNodes
member.summary: Gets the leaf nodes managed by this TreeListView. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TreeListView.LeafCount
member.summary: Gets the count of leaf nodes managed by this TreeListView. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TreeListView.Item(System.Object)
member.summary: Gets the node in the TreeListView that wraps the specified item.
member.param: The item to get the node for.
member.returns: The node in the hierarchy that wraps the specified item.
